H0.text: Flashlights and extra batteries are the items most useful at home during a power failure.

H1.text: Hats and sunscreen are the items that would be most useful at home during a power failure.

H2.text: Raincoats and umbrellas are the items most useful at home during a power failure.

H3.text: Insect spray and jackets are the items that would be most useful at home during a power failure.

A4.text: Flashlight and extra batteries are included in the recommended emergency supplies.
